relations.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections

name: PPTX Strict, (Office Open XML, PresentationML) ISO 29500-1:2008-2012, also ECMA-376, Editions 2-4.
description: A format for presentation documents in the Open Office XML (ISO 29500) format family.  The Strict variant of PPTX was introduced during the standardization in ISO/IEC 29500 in 2008; disallowed is the deprecated VML markup for graphics.  The ability to read Strict PPTX files was implemented in Microsoft's PowerPoint 2010; PowerPoint 2013 added the ability to write Strict files as an option.
